what: Dataset: SNOMED Code Usage in Primary Care in England
title: Clinical Code Usage in England
text: selection full dataset published NHS Digital, data pre-processing see /data-raw/snomed_code_usage.R.

what: Dataset: ICD-10 Code Usage in Secondary Care in England
title: Clinical Code Usage in England
text: package contains ICD-10 codes included diagnosis fields Finished Consultant Episodes (FCE) Hospital Episode Statistics England. selection full dataset published NHS Digital, data pre-processing see /data-raw/icd10_usage.R.
code: # Return ICD-10 code usage data icd10_usage #> # A tibble: 135,951 × 5 #>    start_date end_date   icd10_code description                                        usage #>    <date>     <date>     <chr>      <chr>                                              <int> #>  1 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A000       Cholera due to Vibrio cholerae 01, biovar cholerae     2 #>  2 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A009       Cholera, unspecified                                  40 #>  3 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A010       Typhoid fever                                        884 #>  4 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A011       Paratyphoid fever A                                  139 #>  5 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A012       Paratyphoid fever B                                   13 #>  6 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A013       Paratyphoid fever C                                    2 #>  7 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A014       Paratyphoid fever, unspecified                        68 #>  8 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A020       Salmonella enteritis                                2165 #>  9 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A021       Salmonella sepsis                                    319 #> 10 2023-04-01 2024-03-31 A022       Localized salmonella infections                       82 #> # ℹ 135,941 more rows

what: ICD-10 Code Usage from Hospital Admitted Patient Care Activity in England — icd10_usage
title: ICD-10 Code Usage from Hospital Admitted Patient Care Activity in England — icd10_usage
text: Yearly summary ICD-10 code usage 1st April 2013 31st March 2024. Restricted codes. annual usage published, removed dataset.

title: ICD-10 Code Usage from Hospital Admitted Patient Care Activity in England — icd10_usage
ICD-10 Code Usage from Hospital Admitted Patient Care Activity in England — icd10_usage
text: data frame 135,951 rows 6 columns: start_date Start date code usage count end_date End date code usage count icd10_code ICD-10 Code. Note punctuation code removed compatibility OpenCodelists. usage Yearly summary code usage. description Description ICD-10 Code

title: SNOMED Code Usage in Primary Care in England — snomed_usage
SNOMED Code Usage in Primary Care in England — snomed_usage
text: data frame 1,366,513 rows 6 columns: start_date Start date code usage count end_date End date code usage count snomed_concept_id SNOMED Concept ID usage Yearly summary code usage. Note counts rounded nearest 10. Counts 5 displayed 5. active_at_start Specifying whether code active start date. active_at_end Specifying whether code active end date. description Description SNOMED Concept ID
